new_features.whats_new: Improved handling of cloud-based services and tasks connected to ClickHouse.
new_features.impact: Users will experience better performance and reliability when using cloud services.
new_features.changes_description: Enhanced ClickHouse tests ensure better integration with cloud operations.

new_features.impact: The Docker images will now use a more standardized tagging system.
new_features.changes_description: This simplifies the tagging process and reduces confusion for users.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Fixed issues related to migration flags.
bug_fixes.impact: This fix streamlines the migration process for users.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Removed unnecessary migration flags for clarity during updates.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Addressed runtime issues during ClickHouse operations.
bug_fixes.impact: Improved stability for applications relying on ClickHouse.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Adjusted runtime configurations to improve cloud interactions and decrease limitations on how many processes can run simultaneously.

tests.impact: Increased confidence in the platform's reliability and performance.
tests.changes_description: Tests now cover cloud-related scenarios to ensure robust operation on the ClickHouse platform.

documentation.whats_new: Documented the update process for dependencies.
documentation.impact: Users will have clearer guidance on how to manage dependencies during updates.
documentation.changes_description: Added instructions and explanations regarding dependency version updates, especially related to Rust dependencies.

others.whats_new: Removed deprecated prefixes from published images.
others.impact: Cleaner and more intuitive image naming conventions.
others.changes_description: The change enhances usability in image management.
